entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then partly cloudy. A few thunderstorms early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 early this evening then light overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
